summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Multi-Industry Lead Scraper application. All backend APIs and frontend functionality are working correctly including file management, industry detection, cookie configuration, and navigation between pages.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/scraper/industries returns all 6 industries (plumbing, hvac, electrical, remodeling, landscaping, power_washing)
Backend: GET /api/scrapes returns files list with test_plumbing_leads.csv (1 file, 3 records)
Backend: POST /api/scraper/detect-industry correctly detects industry from text input
Backend: GET /api/scraper/cookies/status returns configured status (false as expected)
Backend: GET /api/scrapes/download/test_plumbing_leads.csv successfully downloads CSV file with correct content
Backend: GET /api/scraper/jobs returns empty jobs list (as expected for new installation)
Frontend: /scrapes page loads correctly and displays test_plumbing_leads.csv file with metadata
Frontend: /scraper page loads with industry dropdown showing all 6 industries
Frontend: Cookie settings panel toggles correctly and displays input textarea
Frontend: Industry dropdown contains all expected options and allows selection
Frontend: URLs textarea accepts Facebook group URLs and triggers industry auto-detection
Frontend: Start scraper button is correctly disabled when cookies not configured
Frontend: Search functionality works on scrapes page with real-time filtering
Frontend: Tag filter dropdown works and filters files by tags
Frontend: Download buttons work for individual files
Frontend: Navigation between /scrapes and /scraper pages works bidirectionally
Frontend: File statistics display correctly (1 files â€¢ 3 total records)
Frontend: Quick download links section displays with copy functionality
Integration: All data-testid attributes present for robust automated testing
Integration: Backend APIs properly integrated with frontend components
Integration: File management system working end-to-end
Integration: Industry detection API properly integrated with frontend dropdown
